title: Mario Forever Ver.4  [PC GAmE]
description:
Mario Forever is a very good remake of the venerable classic game -- Super Mario. Once again you strap on your
 wrench and hardhat and guide the chubby plumber through many skillfully made levels. The diversity of the levels
 is very impressive. You will have to get through levels ranging from underwater caverns to levels filled with hot
 lava. Version 4 includes many updates, enhancements, and bug fixes. In new version youÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´ll find a level editor and new hidden map in save selector area. Mario Worker as level editor.
